metadata.title: RHSA-2023:0160: rh-postgresql10-postgresql security and bug fix update (Moderate)
metadata.description:
PostgreSQL is an advanced object-relational database management system (DBMS).

The following packages have been upgraded to a later upstream version:
rh-postgresql10-postgresql (10.23).

Security Fix(es):

* postgresql: Extension scripts replace objects not belonging to the extension. (CVE-2022-2625)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

Bug Fix(es):

* rh-postgresql10-postgresql: Update to the latest PostgreSQL version 10.23 (BZ#2157611)

bugzilla.text: Extension scripts replace objects not belonging to the extension.

platform: Red Hat Software Collections for Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7
